name: Missing Love
storyline:
In the early 2000s Somewhere in America, There is a serial killer who calls himself the Love Killer who likes to murder any couple indiscriminately.
For five years, you'll play Elijah Sanders, a private investigator whose partner is Lieutenant Anthony Williams.
victim woman named Kate Hernandez, who is believed to be the latest victim of the Love Killer, must find out who the Love Killer is.........
summary: In the early 2000s Somewhere in America, There is a serial killer who calls himself the Love Killer who likes to murder any couple indiscriminately For five years, you'll play Elijah Sanders, a private investigator whose partner is Lieutenant Anthony Williams. victim woman named Kate Hernandez.
